price: We had already given a command to Adam before, but he forgot, and We found him lacking a firm resolve[43].
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا
footnotes: [43] To resist the temptation of eating from the forbidden tree.
